text: Yavatmal Terminus is a small railway station in Yavatmal district in the Indian state of Maharashtra. Its code is YTL. It serves Yavatmal city. The station consists of two platforms. The platforms are not well sheltered. The station lacks many facilities including water and sanitation. * *The little known story about Shakuntala Railway *An express that stops for everyone Historic Shakuntala Express used to runs starts from this station. * * * * Initial work on Yavatmal New Railway station started. It will be constructed behind Z.P school Arni road Yavatmal. == Trains == * Yavatmal - Murtajapur NG Passenger (Unreserved) ==References== Category:Railway stations in Yavatmal district Category:Bhusawal railway division Category:Railway stations opened in 1912 Category:1912 establishments in India Category:Railway terminus in India
title: Yavatmal Terminus
